Luckbolt.name: Luckbolt
Luckbolt.flavor: A silvery-blue radiance streaks away from the Luckbringer to surround a companion, imbuing the recipient with bountiful good fortune.
Luckbolt.target: You or one ally within the burst
Luckbolt.effect: The target makes saving throws against all effects that a save can end. The target gains a +4 bonus to all these saving throws.

Inauspicious Vulnerability.name: Inauspicious Vulnerability
Inauspicious Vulnerability.flavor:
You unleash a terrible malaise upon your enemies, weakening
their resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder.
keywords: Cold, Divine, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder
Inauspicious Vulnerability.effect: Enemies in the burst gains a vulnerability 10 + your Charisma modifier to cold, fire, lightning, and thunder (save ends).

Divine Tilt.name: Divine Tilt
Divine Tilt.flavor: You channel the divine radiance of Lady Luck to protect you and your allies against enemy attacks, while bringing ill luck to your foes.
Divine Tilt.effect: All allies within the burst gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Divine Tilt.onHit: All enemies in the burst take a â€“5 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
